        boolean isHorizontalSelection()
        Gets the current direction of selection. If true, then after input the selection moves to right, else downwards.

        input characted to currently selected cell

        Returns:

      • turnSelectionDirection

        void turnSelectionDirection()
        changes input direction from horizontal to vertical or vice versa.

      • move

        void move(Model.direction dir,
        boolean jumpOverNonInputCells)
        Move selection in grid.
        Parameters:
        dir - direction for moving
        jumpOverNonInputCells - if true, the movement will be continued over static non-input cells to the next input cell in the same column/row
